VIAYN.samples package¶

Submodules¶

VIAYN.samples.vote_ranges module¶

class VIAYN.samples.vote_ranges.BinaryVoteRange¶

Bases: VIAYN.project_types.VoteRange

static contains(value: float) → bool¶

Checks whether or not ‘value’ is valid for this vote range. :param value: the value to be checked :type value: float

Returns

valid – whether or not the vote is valid for this VoteRange

Return type

bool

static maxVote() → float¶
Returns

maximum – the maximum possible float that can be cast in this system. e.g. 5 for 5star voting may be inf or nan

Return type

float

static minVote() → float¶
Returns

maximum – the minimum possible float that can be cast in this system e.g. 1 for 5star voting may be inf or nan

Return type

float
